snippet: It accused the United States on Thursday of threatening its security by regularly sending surveillance flights near the Chinese coast.
abstract: China denies that its fighter jets flew dangerously close to American surveillance aircraft in South China Sea; accuses United States of imperiling its security by regularly dispatching such flights near Chinese coast.
lead_paragraph: It accused the United States on Thursday of threatening its security by regularly sending surveillance flights near the Chinese coast.

headline.main: China, Denying Close Encounter With American Plane, Points Finger at U.S.
headline.print_headline: China Denies Close Encounter With U.S. Aircraft

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
